meta.title: Serhiy Prytula Foundation Training Center | Interceptor Crew Training
meta.description: Professional training for UAV interceptor crews. Certified center. 83% kill rate. Free for Armed Forces of Ukraine.

hero.subtitle: Saving lives of military personnel by training highly professional crews of UAV operators — aerial target interceptors.

about.label: About us
about.title: About Training Center
about.paragraph1_before_free: Serhiy Prytula Foundation Training Center provides
about.paragraph1_after: in areas that directly impact the effectiveness of modern warfare. We train interceptor crews to destroy enemy drones, and fighters — to save the lives of their comrades on the battlefield. We don't just transfer equipment to the Defense Forces — we prepare people who can use it as effectively as possible.
about.paragraph2: We don't just purchase drones for the army — we invest in professional crew training to ensure high efficiency of technology application. An untrained crew cannot realize the potential of the equipment they use.
about.paragraph3: Our professional team of 8 instructors pours their heart into every cadet. Former military personnel and civilian professionals work together to ensure the quality of the training process.

uav.label: UAV Pilot Training
uav.title: Full Piloting Course
uav.description: Comprehensive operator training — from basic knowledge and simulators to practical flights in combat scenarios. Programs are developed by instructors with frontline experience and constantly updated according to battlefield realities.

tactical_medicine.label: Tactical Medicine Training
tactical_medicine.title: Battlefield Medicine
tactical_medicine.description: Preparing fighters to provide first aid in combat conditions — from stopping bleeding to evacuating the wounded. Courses are built on real TCCC protocols and constantly adapted to current battlefield challenges.

ecosystem.title: Certified per Resolution №1129
ecosystem.description: Official certification in accordance with Resolution №1129.

full-cycle.title: Member of UAV Schools Association
full-cycle.description: Part of the UAV Schools Association of Ukraine.

results.title: Own training ground
results.description: Dedicated training ground for practical flights.

tactical_medicine.label: Advantages
tactical_medicine.title: Why choose our tactical medicine track

scale.title: Annual Tactical Medicine Forum
scale.description: Large-scale forum for sharing experience and best practices.

international.title: Monthly specialized seminars
international.description: Regular seminars on current tactical medicine topics.

analytics.title: Analytical reports
analytics.description: Systematizing experience and evidence-based approach to training.

network.title: Lessons Learned implementation
network.description: Continuous program improvement based on real combat experience.

registration.subtitle: Fill out the form and our team will contact you within 24 hours

donate.title: Support Training Center
donate.description: Your support helps train professional military personnel and provide them with the best equipment.

partnerships.label: Cooperation
partnerships.title: Partnership
partnerships.description: Every invoice, receipt, act, spreadsheet — fully open to our partners. Quality training is not cheap. But every downed enemy UAV is a strongpoint that won't be hit by a guided bomb.

impact.title: Real Impact
impact.description: 1 UAH spent destroys 52 UAH of enemy assets. Every downed UAV saves lives.

transparency.title: Full Transparency
transparency.description: Every invoice, receipt, act, spreadsheet — fully open to our partners with regular updates.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.description: Public recognition of your contribution and PR activity opportunities

footer.tagline: Saving lives of military personnel by training highly professional crews.
